page.title: 12My Diet
page.content:
The sort of foods I like to eat are chips, salads and Chinese food. At home we eat lots of fried things like beefburgers, bacon and sausages. When we are out shopping we often go to a fast food restaurant like MacDonalds or Wimpys. At these places we buy burgers, chips, pie and coffee or tea. Sometimes we drink cola or milkshake.
Many of the things we eat at home are packaged, things like fish fingers or baked beans. On Sunday we have a big family lunch of roast meat, potatoes (sometimes roast and boiled) and two vegetables with gravey. If we have beef we also have Yorkshire Puddings. This is my father's favourite meal, but I prefer burgers or a Chinese meal from the local fish and chip shop.
